document.masterDocTitle: The checklist of longhorn beetles (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae) from India

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The checklist of longhorn beetles (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae) from India

subSubSection.paragraph: Cerambyx stigma Voet, 1778 : 15, pl. XIII, fig. 54 (n. n.); Voet, 1 806: 15, pl. XIII, fig. 54 (n. n.).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution: India ( India Orientalis; Assam : Kashi Hills; S-India; TN: Nagapattinam; AR), France I., Borneo, Java , Africa, Sumatra , Java , Banda,
Sri Lanka
, Malaysia , Hengduan Mts. Region , China : Shaanxi , Shanxi , Zhejiang , Fujian , Taiwan , Guangdong , Hong Kong , Hainan , Guangxi , Guizhou , Sichuan , Yunnan ; Korea , Japan , Philippines & Vietnam .
